about_the_game:
Cubetory is a factory-building game with a deep focus on automation. You'll place conveyor belts, launchers, stampers, power stations and tons of other machines as you build your factory. Being on a tiny island forces you to get creative to build the best factory possible. No enemies means you have all the time you need to figure it out.

Supply lines and Rate of Production

Your goal is produce Supply Cubes, and belt those to the PIT. Each new tier of technology is unlocked by reaching a target rate of production, perfect for people who love tweaking their factory to run just right. New tiers introduce advanced technology, more room to build, and new types of Supply Cubes to bring to the PIT. You'll never have to remove old supply lines — only upgrade them — as your factory will need to produce every type of Supply Cube to progress.

Paint-based manufacturing with the P.I.T.

Manufacturing starts with mining some cubes, painting them to match a recipe, and feeding them to the PIT. The PIT and paint patches aren't that big, so you'll have to get creative with your belts to squeeze every drop of efficiency from them.

name: Cubetory
short_description: Build the ultimate factory on a tiny island! Use conveyor belts and way too many machines to research your way through an expansive tech tree. Conveyor chaos or clockwork efficiency? You decide! Play at your own pace with no enemies or time limits in this cozy automation game.
